description:
FocoVideo is one of the best FREE HD/FHD TikTok video makers & video editors with amazing templates, transitions, pop music, and effects. Photo to video just in secedes!

FocoVideo is the easiest video maker to edit your video with. Simply try our amazing daily-updated templates. FocoVideo is also the most entertaining video editor designed for TikTok lovers, it doesn’t matter that you are social media influencers, content creators, vloggers, short video creators, or Pro music video makers, FocoVideo will always be in your toolset. FocoVideo can let you easily merging and create incredible videos with never-before-seen real-time effects and transitions then it allows you to share to TikTok or Instagram.

[KEY FEATURES]
-FocoVideo offers tons of animated templates with spectacular effects, transitions and they are updated constantly.
-Every FocoVideo transition hits the exact music beat and makes your video stand out and like a pro.
-Dozens of high-quality FREE music can perfectly meet your needs and imagination.

[MUSIC VIDEO EDITOR]
·FocoVideo aims to provide a quick and easy editing process.
·Various animated templates with up-to-date TikTok effects and transitions.
·Every distinctive transition follows the exact music rhythm or beat.
·The easiest and fastest video editor maker ever.
·Don’t forget to save your albums and it’s free!

[PHOTO TO VIDEO IN SECONDS]
·Merging the chosen photos into a high-quality video with stunning effects and transitions.
·The easiest music video editor/TikTok maker ever! Perfectly matches all level video editors from beginners to pro.
·New templates are updated every day!

[TikTok VIDEO MAKER]
·Provides a variety of template themes like Beats, K-Pop, Anime, Forward & Backward, 2.5D animation, Merge, etc.,
·No experiences or skills are needed; you can easily make whatever amazing video with FocoVideo anytime & anywhere.

[SHARING]
·FocoVideo is the easiest music video editor & TikTok maker in terms of sharing. Just click and get ready to share with your friends on Tik Tok, Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, or Snapchat!

With FocoVideo, you can easily combine photos with music, plus animated transition effects make your video unique and will never be the same. And FocoVideo is free! You have to try this amazing HD full-screen music video maker and TikTok maker and just share your work with TikTok and other social media platforms.

You can edit a video with your selfie, make a video with music, export music videos in HD quality, and share your music video on Tik Tok, how amazing it is to turn your photos & video clips into a celebrity video with music, amazing effects, and transitions!

Also, you can stick your photos in funny Ecards, popular Music Videos, and dancing GIFs – for holidays, birthdays, and special occasions! Create your video with flashy transitions, or a series of gorgeous slideshows.

FocoVideo Pro Subscription
- A FocoVideo Pro subscription provides unlimited access to ALL current and future functions in FocoVideo.
- Payment will be charged to Apple Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period

Website: http://focovideo.focodesign.com
Privacy Policy: https://focovideo.focodesign.com/privacy

Any feedback? Contact us via support@focoedit.com or Facebook @focovideoapp, we are expecting your reviews to help us going further.
